page.title: 13Education
page.content: There are four schools in our area, including our school. Altogether there are 16 classes, 197 boys and 165 girls. Two schools are in Saughall, the Thomas Wedge Junior School, and the Ridings Infants School. Also, there is the Mollington Primary and the Backford Primary school. The Saughall Thomas Wedge School is made out of two parts.The oldest part was built in 1852 and the other part was added in 1910. There are 2 mobiles . When some work was going on in 1983 a 300 year old well was dicovered, it is now has a man-hole cover on it. The Ridings Infant School was built in 1974.
